issue.title: [Rust] [Parquet] Reorganize test_common mod to allow more test util codes.
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-4634](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-4634). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Currently test_common mod is just one file, and when we need to add more test utils into it, things may messed up, so I propose to make test_common a directory with multi sub mods.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-4634?focusedCommentId=16778520) by Wes McKinney (wesm):*
Issue resolved by pull request 3710
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/3710>
